task.title: Monitoring Backup Jobs
task.shortdesc: Track the status of active and completed backup operations in .

context.p: Use the Cloud Dashboard to monitor job activity in real time. Navigate to and log in to your administrator account.
Use the On-Prem Monitor from your local management console. Access it from the Control Panel.

step.cmd: Go to Job Monitor in the main navigation.
Filter jobs by status: Running, Completed, or Failed.

step.note: Both platforms allow exporting job logs for troubleshooting or auditing purposes.
step.cmd: Click on a job to view detailed logs and resource usage.
